description: Users may experience crashes or unexpected behavior in Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 125.0.2535.67 after applying the security update associated with CVE-2024-5274. This type confusion vulnerability, inherent to the Chromium engine, could lead to instability when interacting with crafted HTML pages. The problematic behavior can manifest as the browser freezing or forcibly closing during normal usage, particularly when handling dynamic web content. Users should ensure they are running the updated version 125.0.6422.112 to mitigate these risks. Reference KB-125.0.2535.67 for detailed update instructions and remedies for these issues.
